channel.title: My Rs Accounts Keep Getting Hacked!
channel.description:
Hey, I really need help because there is something or someone is hacking in my computer and is hacking every account of runescape I have when I log in it. I don't know what to do :S
I really need help because I work so so hard for my runescape accounts.
Thanks iiLovePvP.

item.title: My Rs Accounts Keep Getting Hacked!
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

Or boot your computer from a linux live cd that has java pre-installed. Like Mint or Mepis.

Steps:

  1. dl the iso
  2. burn it to a cd or dvd.
  3. restart your pc with the cd on it.
  4. on the cd menu select live cd, and wait until the desktop shows up.
  5. open fire fox and go to rs and start playing.

Off topic: Mopar should have its own custom linux distro (maybe an arch linux with jre) ready for playing rsps or rs for this kind of situations. :o
So just dl it burn it and your ready to go.

Read full topic
item.source: My Rs Accounts Keep Getting Hacked!

item.description:

vManlyMan:

If all else fails reformat your computer. That’s what I do when I get really bad viruses.

that’s exactly what I do too, I save my important files to a usb or a cd, and then I re-format, and re-install my windows programs.

Read full topic
